oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter to Michael Wyrick outlining pension legislation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Rep. John M. C. Smith of Michigan sent this letter on behalf of the House of Representative's Committee on War Claims to Civil War veteran Michael Wyrick, who served as a private in Co. G, 68th Ohio Vol. Inf., USA. It informed him of pension legislation, the Sherwood Bill, known as the "Dollar-a-Day Pension Bill" in the House. The letter includes a chart outlining pension payments based on age and time of service, and explains the procedure for applying for the pension.
